articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.title: Steam can now transfer games over your local network - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Steam Local Network Game Transfers lets you install a game on multiple machines after only downloading them on one.
articles.content: A new Steam feature allows you to transfer games between machines using your local network. If you've got a game installed on your desktop PC, and you want to play it on Steam Deck for example, you c… [+1702 chars]
